column4: Would anyone be able to tell me if moving my /boot partition above where my windows partition is would "corrupt" or otherwise damage my ability to boot into windows?
You shouldn't be moving your partitions around
I need to, grub is giving me error 18, so my /boot needs to be within a certain part of the drive. If I move it up past the windows partition, will that kill windows?
I woudn't know, but it would probably change your partition names. Instead of Windows being sda1, it'll be sda2. Best to ask someone else about it though
